name: Vet Ambulance Njuška
en: Vaccination, physical therapies for animals, grooming for dogs and cats, food, equipment and pet cosmetics, pet salon, testing for infectious diseases, parasitic and microbiological tests, urine tests and fatigue, blood tests, MRS, currents, emergency pet dental interventions, therapeutic ultrasound, hormone level determination, parasitic disease testing, teeth polishing, ultrasonic scaling.
